Articles.Content:
This is the game of "Do You Remember (TM)"!

The rules are simple. I ask if you remember something from the Semi-old days of KSP. If you do, then say so and see if someone else remembers a thing of your choosing.

I'll start: Does anyone remember when you could reenter the atmosphere without a heat shield?

Technically you still can...

Do you remember when you had to attach Mainsails to orange tanks with a plate so they wouldn't overheat?

I do remember that. Generally I still do out of habit, though it's just extra fuel tanks because I need more fuel.

Do you remember when you couldn't rotate the camera in the Space Center view?

That's optional now.

Do you remember when the Forums was still in beta?

If by beta, you mean vBulletin.

Do you remember when there was a lot of hype over 0.21?

30 year ago your parents saying:

would you please stop with this gameboy
would you please stop with this gameboy
would you please stop with this gameboy
would you please stop with this gameboy

and years later as someone who extremly rarely have it's cell phone charged while paying the monthly bill for it

saying to your parent

would you please stop with you cell phone
would you please stop with you cell phone
would you please stop with you cell phone
would you please stop with you cell phone

oh oh oh so much irony ^^

edit: wich bring us here: 

 

Edited January 31, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

Uh...

On 1/20/2017 at 7:39 AM, TopHeavy11 said:

I ask if you remember something from the Semi-old days of KSP.
Do you remember when MkII parts had thermal tiles?

10 minutes ago, 0111narwhalz said:

Do you remember when MkII parts had thermal tiles?

Mk2 parts used to have thermal tiles??
Oyes. Look at some of CupcakeLanders' older dropships-- they're black.

well.... uh..... Gosh considering I bought KSP after 1.0, I really can't say anything "Old" per-say...... huh.... OH!

Does anyone remember when if you put an object close to a wheel in 1.1.3, the wheel would just sink into the ground? (Yes, I know that's dumb, but it's the only thing I've got atm)

Heh. Wheels were weird then.

Do you remember when drag was proportional to mass?

LOL those were the day, eh?

 

Do you remember when there was no contracts? I don't, because I bought the game at 0.24.1 so I've always had contracts.

Heh. Like it was yesterday.

Do you remember the science spam?

do you remember the really ugly LY-10 small landing gear?

 

Cut me some slack, i bought the game in 1.0.5

I do indeed remember that.

Do you remember the days before tweakables?

17 minutes ago, 0111narwhalz said:

I do indeed remember that.

Do you remember the days before tweakables?

the line tweakables coming soon still exists in some very old part cfgs's i have.

How about KSP  before EC ( a mod did EC first, for those not as ancient)  and solar panels

No, i don't remember Pre-EC days (started in 0.18.4).

Do you remember Bobcat and his mods (seriously, that dude was lie the Roverdude of his day)?

I still have a few installs with some Bobcat mods! Just hope RoverDude doesn't burn out the same way.

Do you remember when the 48-7s was added? Every spaceplane had to have it!

Ummm, nope.

Do you remember when jet engines looked not-aesthetically pleasing, and the texture update of 1.0.5?

(Cut me some slack, aight? I bought the game in 1.0.4.)

Uh, I guess, no? I haven't been around for long.

Can you remember the day Moho has superheated atmosphere?

Supposedly that went away in 0.23.5, and I have older versions than that, but I was too much of a noob then.

Do you remember when the Spaceport was full of "Two Hundred Mainsail Lifters?"

No... but I have seen it in old videos.

Do you remember the ugly old mk1 fuselage texture?

If you're talking about the one from before Porkjet, yes.

Do you remember when SAS prevented you from turning at all?
Do you remember that you could do a reentry at a 90° angle to the Kerbin surface doing 4000 m/s, and still slow down for a controlled landing without burning up?
